Name: oid
Description: Row identifier (hidden attribute; must be explicitly\nselected)

Name: fdwhandler
Description: References a handler function that is responsible for supplying\nexecution routines for the foreign-data wrapper. Zero if no handler is provided

Name: fdwvalidator
Description: References a validator function that is responsible for\nchecking the validity of the options given to the foreign-data wrapper, as well as options for foreign servers and user mappings using the foreign-data wrapper. Zero if no validator is provided

Name: fdwacl
Description: Access privileges; see GRANT and\nREVOKE for details

Name: fdwoptions
Description: Foreign-data wrapper specific options, as "keyword=value" strings
